# clearpass_auth_method (Resource)

Authentication Method Resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `method_type` (String) Type of the auth method
- `name` (String) Name of the auth method

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the auth method
- `details` (Block List) Details of the auth method (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--details))
- `inner_methods` (List of String) List of inner methods of the auth method

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Numeric ID of the auth method

<a id="nestedblock--details"></a>
### Nested Schema for `details`

Optional:

- `allow_anonymous_provisioning` (Boolean) Allow anonymous mode (requires no server certificate)
- `allow_authenticated_provisioning` (Boolean) Allow authenticated mode (requires server certificate)
- `allow_fast_reconnect` (Boolean) Fast Reconnect
- `allow_unknown_clients` (Boolean) Allow Unknown End-Hosts
- `auth_provisioning_require_client_cert` (Boolean) Require end-host certificate for provisioning
- `autz_required` (Boolean) Authorization Required
- `certificate_comparison` (String) Certificate Comparison
- `challenge` (String) Challenge
- `client_certificate_auth` (Boolean) End-Host Authentication
- `encryption_scheme` (String) Enable Aruba-SSO
- `enforce_crypto_binding` (String) Cryptobinding
- `group_name` (String) Group
- `machine_pac_enable` (Boolean) Machine PAC
- `machine_pac_lifetime` (Number) Machine PAC Expire Time
- `machine_pac_lifetime_units` (String) Machine PAC Expire Time Units
- `nap_support_enable` (Boolean) Microsoft NAP Support
- `no_of_retries` (Number) Number of retries
- `ocsp_enable` (String) Verify Certificate using OCSP
- `ocsp_url` (String) OCSP URL
- `override_cert_url` (Boolean) Override OCSP URL from Client
- `pass_reset_flow` (String) Password reset sends in
- `posture_pac_enable` (Boolean) Posture PAC
- `posture_pac_lifetime` (Number) Posture PAC Expire Time
- `posture_pac_lifetime_units` (String) Posture PAC Expire Time Units
- `public_password` (String) Public Password
- `public_username` (String) Public Username
- `server_id` (String) Server Id
- `session_cache_enable` (Boolean) Session Resumption
- `session_timeout` (Number) Session Timeout
- `tunnel_pac_lifetime` (Number) Tunnel PAC Expire Time
- `tunnel_pac_lifetime_units` (String) Tunnel PAC Expire Time Units
- `user_auth_pac_enable` (Boolean) Authorization PAC
- `user_auth_pac_lifetime` (Number) Authorization PAC Expire Time
- `user_auth_pac_lifetime_units` (String) Authorization PAC Expire Time Units
